attributes.action: introduce legislation to make illegal any use of council taxpayer pounds on special treatment of any particular ethnic group by taxpayer funded organisations, without taxpayers also receiving an invitation to the event.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in charge of taxpayer funded organisations like the police force in Warwickshire, treat taxpayers with complete disdain.  The example of disbursing taxpayer pounds on Roma gypsies 'to improve tensions between two groups of Roma gypsies' is a classic misuse of taxpayer pounds on people who do not contribute to the funding of the organisation which is laying on the social occasion.  This indicates that the people in charge of the police force just do not get it!
